name: First Run Movie Theater
text: Sit back, relax, and enjoy the show! Our digital movie theater shows some of the most popular movies currently running in theaters.
movieinfo:
Ice Age Collision Course

  • 7.22.16 - 8.4.16
  • Friday: 6pm & 9pm
  • Saturday: 3pm, 6pm & 9pm
  • Sunday: 3pm & 6pm
  • Monday-Thursday: 3pm & 6pm

Synopsis: Scrat's epic pursuit of the elusive acorn catapults him into the universe where he accidentally sets off a series of cosmic events that transform and threaten the Ice Age World. To save themselves, Sid, Manny, Diego, and the rest of the herd must leave their home and embark on a quest full of comedy and adventure, travelling to exotic new lands and encountering a host of colorful new characters.
